title: Shadow Knights tileset
content:
Does anyone have the Shadow Knights tileset [in picture form of course] that I could downl;oad, I had it, but lost it.

Kays, thnxA proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Shadow Knights tileset
content:
I think I have it on my other computer. I'll look sometime.Groeten van Frenkel
Visit [url=http://www.sfprod.cjb.net]The Official S&F Prod. Homepage[/url]

title: Re: Shadow Knights tileset
content:
Please do, I don't want to have to extract it, I'd have to spend *hours* on an extraction program.

EDIT: No! It uses the same format as Dangerous dave! And whats more, SK doesn't load the whole tileset, it uses a primitive form of Keen 4-6 technology to only load the tiles in the level.

So, if anyone else's interested, here it is: [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/sktil.png[/img]

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
